value.name: FRANCES ANN SCOTT BENNETT
value.description: MANNING - Frances Ann Scott Bennett, 70, widow of Arthur Bennett, died on Friday, May 21, 2021, at Carolina Medical Center, Charlotte, North Carolina. She was born on Sept. 25, 1950, in Sumter, a daughter of Inez Wilson Scott Taylor and the late
